nodes.bodyText: tbh the "static" makes be a bit nervous..

I think this should be clearer.
If nothing else, pls add some javadoc here; or improve the method name and e.g. extract product.isBOM() into a variable notAComponent
Think of a dev wondering why tf it doesn't want to mark a bom-product.
PS: also check out the failing test at https://jenkins.metasfresh.com/job/metasfresh/job/gh6987/1/testReport/
